h1: Only a fit note can be uploaded and processed by this service

noFitNote.text: If you do not have a fit note and do require one, get in touch with your doctor or GP practice. The following are examples of a medical letter, isolation note and MED 10. They are not fit notes and cannot be uploaded onto this service.

medicalEvidence.text1: However, you can post alternative medical evidence, such as a medical letter, isolation note or MED 10 to
medicalEvidence.text2: Please ensure that you have a copy or duplicate of your medical evidence before sending it.

details.text1: Medical evidence can be posted directly to ESA using the address
details.text2: You do not need a postage stamp.

imgAlts.img1: Examples of a medical letter, isolation note and a MED10
imgAlts.img2: Postal envelope with the postal address

link: Go back to Send your fit note
